function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited representation of diverse experiences in the podcast, particularly those of minority groups and marginalized voices.","Impact":"Failure to provide a comprehensive understanding of the social, political, and economic impacts of COVID-19 in cities. Perpetuation of privilege and power imbalances.","Mitigation":"Actively seek out and include diverse voices and experiences in the podcast content. Prioritize amplifying the stories of minority groups and marginalized individuals.","Technologies":"Digital platforms for hosting and sharing diverse content, community engagement strategies for outreach to underrepresented groups.","People":"Minority groups, marginalized individuals, contributors to the podcast, listeners of the podcast.","Owner":"Podcast producers, content creators, community organizations, advocacy groups."}]}
